mapper.insert:
SELECT TO_CHAR(NOW(),'YYMM')||LPAD(CAST(NEXTVAL('PR_GOODS_BASE_SQ01') AS VARCHAR(7)),7,'0') AS goodsNo
INSERT INTO PR_GOODS_BASE ( /* prPregGoodsBaseTrx.applyPregGoods */ GOODS_NO , GOODS_NM , SHRT_GOODS_NM , LGC_GOODS_NO , ENTR_NO , STD_CTG_NO , GOODS_COMP_CD , GOODS_TYP_CD , SALE_METH_CD , BRAND_NO , MODL_NM , HOME_NM , MFCO_NM , INCOM_NM , SALEMN_NM , SAFE_CERTI_TGT_YN , BUYR_AGE_LMT_CD , DISP_YN , SALE_STAT_CD , GOODS_REG_DTM , SALE_STR_DTM , SALE_END_DTM , BUY_TYP_CD , TAX_GB_CD , STK_MGR_YN , BUY_QTY_LMT_YN , MIN_LMT_QTY , MAX_LMT_QTY , DELI_PROC_TYP_CD , DELI_GOODS_GB_CD , DELI_WAY_CD , DELI_DDAY , TDAY_SND_PSB_YN , WD_SND_PSB_TM , SDAY_SND_PSB_YN , SDAY_SND_PSB_TM , ITM_SOUT_NOTI_YN , DELI_POLC_NO , BDL_DELI_PSB_YN , BDL_RTN_PSB_YN , RTN_PSB_YN , EXCH_PSB_YN , PRC_COMPA_EXP_YN , SCH_PSB_YN , SCH_KWD_1_NM , SCH_KWD_2_NM , SCH_KWD_3_NM , PKG_GOODS_PRIO_RNK_CD , SYS_REG_ID , SYS_REG_DTM , SYS_MOD_ID , SYS_MOD_DTM ) SELECT #{goodsNo} , GOODS_NM , SHRT_GOODS_NM , LGC_GOODS_NO , ENTR_NO , STD_CTG_NO , GOODS_COMP_CD , GOODS_TYP_CD , SALE_METH_CD , BRAND_NO , MODL_NM , HOME_NM , MFCO_NM , INCOM_NM , SALEMN_NM , SAFE_CERTI_TGT_YN , BUYR_AGE_LMT_CD , DISP_YN , '10' , now() , SALE_STR_DTM , SALE_END_DTM , BUY_TYP_CD , TAX_GB_CD , STK_MGR_YN , BUY_QTY_LMT_YN , MIN_LMT_QTY , MAX_LMT_QTY , DELI_PROC_TYP_CD , DELI_GOODS_GB_CD , DELI_WAY_CD , DELI_DDAY , TDAY_SND_PSB_YN , WD_SND_PSB_TM , SDAY_SND_PSB_YN , SDAY_SND_PSB_TM , ITM_SOUT_NOTI_YN , DELI_POLC_NO , BDL_DELI_PSB_YN , BDL_RTN_PSB_YN , RTN_PSB_YN , EXCH_PSB_YN , PRC_COMPA_EXP_YN , SCH_PSB_YN , SCH_KWD_1_NM , SCH_KWD_2_NM , SCH_KWD_3_NM , PKG_GOODS_PRIO_RNK_CD , #{sysRegId} , now() , #{sysRegId} , now() FROM PR_PREG_GOODS_BASE WHERE PREG_GOODS_NO = #{pregGoodsNo}
